actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-686.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2816, a bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the procedures for the admission of refugees, to amend the Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1962 to establish a more uniform basis for the provision of assistance to refugees, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2816 (Refugee admission and assistance).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2816, a bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to revise the procedures for the admission of refugees, to amend the Migration and Refugee Assistance Act of 1962 to establish a more uniform basis for the provision of assistance to refugees, and for other purposes.
